title: Westlakes: a place to live, work and play
creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, South Australian Film Corporation and Brian Bergin
brief_description: This film deals with the success of the whole Westlakes project from original landscapes through to its modern development today as at attractive and interesting environment anally we see the community successfully operating through people living in various housing and recreation areas.
